Silver Guidelines

This prototype system is used as part of the work on Plain Language.

Below is a list of guidelines that have been added to this prototype system:

Guideline 2-4-10: Section Headings

Guideline 2-2-2: Pause, Stop, Hide

Guideline 1-3-3: Sensory Characteristics

Guideline 4-1-2: Name, Role Value
